tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Crocodile, Emblem of Magazine "Krokodil"", 1960–70.
1960–70. Porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-233.
